Headline: #47 47th, #55 Garfield, #55N 55th/Narragansett, #54B South Cicero, #62H Archer/Harlem, #63 63rd, and #63W West 63rd Temporary Reroute near 59th/Kilpatrick
ShortDescription: 47 47th, 55 Garfield, 55N 55th/Narragansett, 54B South Cicero, 62H Archer/Harlem, 63 63rd, and 63W West 63rd buses are temp. rerouted near 59th/Kilpatrick.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#47 47th, #55 Garfield, #55N 55th/Narragansett, #54B South Cicero, #62H Archer/Harlem, #63 63rd, and #63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 59th/Kilpatrick, due to police activity near 59th/Kilpatrick.

#47 47th buses will operate via Midway Terminal, 59th, Pulaski, 55th, Cicero and over regular route. 

#55 Garfield buses will operate via Midway Terminal, 59th, Pulaski, 55th and over regular route.

#55N 55th/Narragansett buses will operate via Midway Terminal, 59th, Pulaski, 55th and over regular route.

#54B South Cicero buses will operate via Cicero, 63rd, Pulaski, 59th, Midway Terminal, 59th, Pulaski, 55th, Cicero and over regular route.

#62H Archer/Harlem buses will operate via Midway Terminal, 59th, Pulaski, 55th, Cicero and over regular route.

#63 63rd buses will operate via Midway Terminal, 59th, Pulaski, 63rd and over regular route.

#63W West 63rd buses will operate via Midway Terminal, 59th, Pulaski, 63rd and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.
